description:
Attempt to save the JWT (saved from Google OAuth flow)
verify the new one, or the old one saved in localStorage

description:
An on change event for whenever the router changes
Reset the state to re-render the application - used for props in the breadcrumbs

description: Render the application

import {h, Component} from 'preact' import M from 'materialize-css' import HealthHistory from './history/health-history' import OtherQuestions from './history/other' import SignOff from './history/sign-off' import Medication from './history/medication' import Exercise from './history/exercise' import Tobacco from './history/tobacco' import Alcohol from './history/alcohol' import Diet from './history/diet' import Drugs from './history/drugs' import '../../styles/patient-history.scss' class CreateHistory extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = {} } /** * on mount, initialise the collapsible that is created */ componentDidMount() { M.Collapsible.init(this.collapsible) } /** * @returns {preact.VNode} */ render() { return (

Patient History

    this.collapsible = c}>
  • Patient Health History
  • Medication
  • Exercise
  • Dietary Habits
  • Alcohol Use
  • Tobacco Use
  • Drug Use
  • Further Information
  • Sign Off
) } } export default CreateHistory

name: src/client/spa/pages/admit-patient/history/drugs.jsx
content:
import {h} from 'preact' import Questionnaire from './Questionnaire' import {IncButton, DecButton} from './util' class Drugs extends Questionnaire { constructor() { super() this.state = {numDrugs: 1} } /** * create a function to increase an item in state * @param {string} type key in state to update * @returns {Function} */ inc(type) { return () => this.setState({[type]: this.state[type] + 1}) } /** * create a function to decrease an item in state * @param {string} type key in state to update * @returns {Function} */ dec(type) { return () => this.setState({[type]: this.state[type] - 1}) } /** * @returns {preact.VNode} */ render() { return (

Drug Use

Do you currently use recreational drugs/substances?

{this.state.showQuestionnaire ? : ''}
) } } const DrugsQuestionnaire = props => (
Which kind and how frequently?
{Array.from({length: props.numDrugs}).map((_, idx) => (
))}
Have you ever injected recreational drugs with a needle?

) export default Drugs

name: src/client/spa/pages/admit-patient/history/medication.jsx
content:
import {h, Component} from 'preact' import {IncButton, DecButton} from './util' class Medication extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { numScrip: 1, numOtc: 1, numAllergies: 1, } this.incScrip = this.inc('numScrip').bind(this) this.decScrip = this.dec('numScrip').bind(this) this.incOtc = this.inc('numOtc').bind(this) this.decOtc = this.dec('numOtc').bind(this) this.incAllergies = this.inc('numAllergies').bind(this) this.decAllergies = this.dec('numAllergies').bind(this) } /** * create a function to increase an item in state * @param {string} type key in state to update * @returns {Function} */ inc(type) { return () => this.setState({[type]: this.state[type] + 1}) } /** * create a function to decrease an item in state * @param {string} type key in state to update * @returns {Function} */ dec(type) { return () => this.setState({[type]: this.state[type] - 1}) } /** * @returns {preact.VNode} */ render() { return (

Medication

Prescription Medication
{Array.from({length: this.state.numScrip}).map((_, idx) => (
))}
Over the Counter Medication
{Array.from({length: this.state.numOtc}).map((_, idx) => (
))}
Allergies
{Array.from({length: this.state.numAllergies}).map((_, idx) => (
))}
) } } export default Medication

name: src/client/spa/pages/home.jsx
content:
import {h} from 'preact' import {Link} from 'preact-router' import {getJwtPayload} from '../util' import '../styles/welcome.scss' /** * get the given name (or name) from JWT * @returns {Boolean} */ const getGiven = () => getJwtPayload(localStorage.token).given_name || getJwtPayload(localStorage.token).name /** * Welcome page * @return {preact.VNode} Welcome page */ const Welcome = () => { const {permissions} = getJwtPayload(localStorage.getItem('token')) const perms = (permissions || []).includes('edit:permissions') ? (
Manage Permissions

Enable practitioners to access different patients.

) : '' return (

Hi {getGiven()}! Welcome to ASPEN

Warning!

This project is in heavy development and subject to change, break and even disappear

Source code for this program can be found on GitHub.

JSDoc can be found on /docs/js

API Documentation is hosted using Swagger and is available at /docs/api

View your wards

View wards in the practice and access patient details.

Search for a Patient's Vital signs

Search by details for a given patient.

Admit a Patient

Create a new patient, including their photograph and history.

Create a ward

Create a new ward to group patients in.

{perms}
) } export default Welcome

description: get the given name (or name) from JWT

name: src/client/spa/pages/permissions.jsx
componentDidMount
description: get practitioner and encounter information from server. update state for lists

name: setPractitioner
description:
create a function that:
pull all data (patient relationships and permissions) from server
stores this data in state

name: makeGrouping
description:
take the selected practitioner (set in state)
and a function that creates/removes a row with practitioner id and patient ID
in practitionerpatients table

params.name: grouped
params.description: whether the practitioner and patient are grouped

name: togglePermission
description:
attempt to add or remove a practitioner permission
post this to /permissions/toggle as well as practitioner id, permission and their permission set

name: renderPractitioners
description: render a list of practitioners

name: renderPatients
description: render patient list

name: renderPermissions
description: render a permission list based off of component state

name: render
description:
render patient permissions page.
render loader is no patient information loaded yet

invoked on every keydown in the search field

name: src/client/spa/pages/view-ward.jsx

description: Render a ward with patient listing

description:
fetch ward ID from props (in url)
get data from /fhir/Encounter (as has location information)

take all patients for a ward (gotten in componentdidMount())
render them in to a materialize collection after formatting data

constructor

take this.state.wardList (updated from FHIR API in componentDidMount())
render a ward list based off of this
DOM tree should be: a > img+span+p

name: src/client/spa/partial/admit-patient/signature-box.jsx
getStyle
description: given a container, return a function that checks returns a function to get a property value

params.name: container
params.description: Containter to get a style and parse int to

name: emulateTouch
description:
Given a touch event, get the X and Y, and simulate a mousemove event
Simulate button 1: this is the click button

params.name: e
params.description: event to simulate as a mouseclick

name: dispatchMouseUp
description: simulate mouseup on touchstop

name: componentDidMount
description:
on mount, add event listeners for mousemove
add event listeners for touch events that simulate mousemove events

name: componentWillUnmount
description: on unmount, remove all event listeners

name: setPosition
description: Given an event, take the mouse coords and update the mouse position in this component

name: setCanvasDimensions
description: resize the canvas to fill available space on every draw()

name: draw
description:
on a mousemove event, move a virtual pointer on a canvas
update this position with the event
move the virtual pointer to the new place
stroke a line between the beginning and end

name: reset
description: clear the signature on the canvas

Name Dose Frequency
{drug.medication_name} {drug.medication_dose} {drug.medication_frequency}
) /** * * @param {preact.ComponentProps} props * @returns {preact.VNode} */ const HistoryReport = (props) => { if (!props.reportLoaded) { return (
) } console.log(props) const prescriptionDrugs = props.drugs.prescriptions[0].filter(drug => drug.medication_name) const otcDrugs = props.drugs.otc[0].filter(drug => drug.medication_name) const recreationalDrugs = (props.drugs.recreational[0] || []).filter(drug => drug.medication_name) // console.log({otcDrugs, recreationalDrugs, prescriptionDrugs}) console.log(otcDrugs) return (

History: {props.patientName}

Personal Health History

Childhood illnesses:

    {(props.childhood_illnesses || []).map(illness => (

    • ))}

    {(props.surgical_operations || []).map(immun => (

    {(props.other_hospitalisations || []).map(immun => (
  • {immun}
    • ))}

Medication

{prescriptionDrugs.length ? : ''}

OTC Medication:

{otcDrugs.length ? : ''}

Allergies: {props.medication_allergies}

Health Habits and Personal Safety

Exercise

Frequency: {props.exercise_frequency}

Diet

Dieting: {props.dieting ? 'yes' : 'no'}

Meals eaten daily: {props.meals_daily}

Difficulty Eating: {props.difficulties_eating ? 'yes' : 'no'}

Alcohol

Drinks alcohol: {props.drink_alcohol ? 'yes' : 'no'}

{props.drink_alcohol ? (

Kind of alcohol: {props.health_habits_alcohol_type === '' ? 'Not Specified' : props.health_habits_alcohol_type}

Concerned about alcohol intake: {props.health_habits_drink_alcohol_concern}

Considered stopping: {props.health_habits_drink_alcohol_consider_stopping}

) : ''}
Tobacco

Used tobacco in past 5 years: {props.tobacco_last_smoked ? 'yes' : 'no'}

{props.tobacco_last_smoked ? (

Currently using Tobacco:{props.currently_uses_tobacco}

) : ''}
Drugs

{recreationalDrugs.length ? : ''}

) : ''}

name: src/client/spa/partial/view-patient/vital-signs.jsx
content:
import {h, Component} from 'preact' import M from 'materialize-css' import format from 'date-fns/format' import WarningScore from '../../WarningScore' import {doModal} from '../../util' import '../../styles/vital-signs.scss' // swap an EWS for a class to colour table cells (in createTable()) const ewsToClass = [ '', ' yellow', ' orange', ' red', ] function createTable(history) { const historyWithEWS = history.map((observation) => { const ews = new WarningScore(observation) // format observation history (from FHIR API) in to something that can be used within the DOM // score for a hover // className to visualise the EWS // value to display return { date: format(observation.date, 'hh:mma, Do MMM YYYY'), respiratoryRate: { score: ews.scoreResp(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreResp()], value: observation.respiratory_rate, }, oxySat: { score: ews.scoreOxy(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreOxy()], value: observation.oxygen_saturation, }, heartRate: { score: ews.scoreHeart(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreHeart()], value: observation.heart_rate, }, bodyTemp: { score: ews.scoreTemp(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreTemp()], value: observation.body_temperature, }, bloodPressure: { score: ews.scoreBP(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreBP()], value: observation.systolic_bp, }, levelOfConsciousness: { score: ews.scoreCons(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreCons()], value: observation.level_of_consciousness, }, supplOxygen: { score: ews.scoreSuppOxy(), classname: ewsToClass[ews.scoreSuppOxy()], value: observation.supplemental_oxygen, }, } }) const tableDOM = historyWithEWS.map(row => ( {row.date} {row.respiratoryRate.value} {row.oxySat.value} {row.heartRate.value} {row.bodyTemp.value} {row.bloodPressure.value} {row.levelOfConsciousness.value} {row.supplOxygen.value} )) return tableDOM } class Vitals extends Component { /** * Initialise materialize components on page load */ componentDidMount() { console.log('[VITAL SIGNS] mounting') const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.tabs.tabs-fixed-width.vital-record-view-tabs') const select = document.querySelectorAll('select') if (!this.formInstance) this.formInstance = M.FormSelect.init(select) if (!this.tabInstance) this.tabInstance = M.Tabs.init(tabs) } /** * the main router sets state, which propogates an update here * this causes a re-render which kills select instances * re-build the select */ componentDidUpdate() { console.log('[VITAL SIGNS] updating') const select = document.querySelectorAll('select') if (!this.formInstance) this.formInstance = M.FormSelect.init(select) else M.FormSelect.init(select) } /** * on unmount, kill all materialize instances so as to not break the app */ componentWillUnmount() { console.log('[VITAL SIGNS] unmounting') try { if (this.formInstance) this.formInstance.map(el => el.destroy()) if (this.tabInstance) this.tabInstance.map(el => el.destroy()) } catch (err) { console.log('[VITAL SIGNS] Error with unmount cleanup: ', err) } } /** * given the user has pressed 'admit' * 1. validate all items on the page * 2a. if not valid, inform the user with coloured boxes and a modal * 2b. if valid: call props.submitform with the associated vital signs, formatted correctly */ async submitForm() { const requiredInputs = [ 'respiratory_rate', 'oxygen_saturation', 'heart_rate', 'body_temperature', 'systolic_bp', 'level_of_consciousness', ] const invalid = requiredInputs .map(el => document.getElementById(el)) .filter((inp) => { if (!inp.value) return true if (Number.isNaN(inp.value) && inp.id !== 'level_of_consciousness') return true return false }) .map(inp => inp.dataset.invalidName) if (invalid.length) { doModal( 'Error with form!', `You've missed out, or entered some of the fields incorrectly:

  • ${invalid.join('
  • ')}
`, ) return } // everything must be correct, send it back to the main component const form = new FormData() const inputs = requiredInputs.map(el => document.getElementById(el)) inputs.forEach(field => form.append(field.id, field.value)) const oxygen = document.getElementById('supplemental_oxygen') const usesOxygen = oxygen.checked ? 'yes' : 'no' form.append('supplemental_oxygen', usesOxygen) await this.props.submit(form) inputs.splice(inputs.length - 1) // remove level of consciousness from cleanup inputs.forEach(input => input.value = '') M.updateTextFields() } /** * Render input form for vitals and output of prior vitals * @param {object} props component props * @param {DiagnosticReport[]} props.history patient obs history * @returns {VNode} patient info */ render(props) { return (
  • Record Vital Signs
  • Previous Vital Signs

Submit
{createTable(props.history)}
Date Respiratory rate Oxygen Saturation Heart Rate Body Temperature Blood Pressure Level of Consciousness Supplemental Oxygen
) } } export default Vitals

params.description:
the status of the encounter
								(also usually finished as the patient has been admitted)

params.description: patient that this encounter corresponds to

params.description: Database ID. Only used when Location is created from database

params.description: Name of the location (Ward 1, etc). Required for query

params.name: params.description
params.description: Description of the location. Required for query

params.name: params.lastUpdated
params.description: When the object was last updated. Not used for query

description: Ensure object is created with proper params

description: Format database data in to expected fhir formatting

description: Formats the location appropriately to fhir standards

Generates a query for inserting data in to database (uses node-pg structured queries for now)

description: Fhir wrapper for patient information

params.description: whether the patient is still active in the hospital

description: Based on this.id, populate the patient with database info

description: Attempt to insert a patient with params provided

name: update
description: Attempts to perform UPDATE on the database with this.id and params provided

name: delete
description:
Attempts to delete a patient based on this.id
fetch patient photo URL so that this can be removed from the disk
delete the patient from the database, then the image
order is important, because if database delete fails, no more image for patient

description: Formats patient to standard fhir patient

content:
# FYP
> FHIR server with UI to record patient vital signs

## Prerequisites
* Node.js ^11.x.x
* yarn ^1.12.x
* postgres ^10.6
* Database setup according to `db/schema.psql`

## Setup
1. Install dependencies: `yarn`
2. Setup environment: `mv .env-sample .env`
3. Setup the database: `yarn create:db`
4. Build the bundle: `yarn build:prod`
5. Run! `node bin/www`
name: ./README.md

content:
